explanations.TracingFlags::runtime_stats: An atomic unsigned integer used as a bitfield or counter for tracking runtime statistics flags.  Used in tracing.
explanations.TracingFlags::gc: An atomic unsigned integer used as a bitfield or counter for tracking garbage collection flags. Used in tracing.
explanations.TracingFlags::gc_stats: An atomic unsigned integer used as a bitfield or counter for tracking garbage collection statistics flags. Used in tracing.
explanations.TracingFlags::ic_stats: An atomic unsigned integer used as a bitfield or counter for tracking inline cache statistics flags. Used in tracing.
explanations.TracingFlags::zone_stats: An atomic unsigned integer used as a bitfield or counter for tracking zone statistics flags. Used in tracing.
